name: discord
description: This app is a discord app that shows your call stats on the DeskThing

scripts.build: npm run build-discordweb && esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --outfile=builds/index.js && npm run copy-manifest
scripts.postversion: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = require('./manifest.json'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); if (manifest.version !== pkg.version) { manifest.version = 'v' + pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('./manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2), 'utf8'); console.log('Updated manifest version to ' + pkg.version); }" && npm install
